Title: Open Season
Director: Roger Allers, Jill Culton, Anthony Stacchi(co-director)
Writer: Steve Bencich (screenplay by), Ron J. Friedman (screenplay by), Nat Mauldin (screenplay by), Jill Culton (screen story by), Anthony Stacchi (screen story by), Steve Moore (from an original story by), John B. Carls (from an original story by), Sam Harper (additional story material), Dan Wilson (additional story material), David Gilbreth (additional story material)
Actors: Martin Lawrence, Ashton Kutcher, Gary Sinise, Debra Messing
Plot: Boog, a domesticated 900lb. Grizzly bear, finds himself stranded in the woods 3 days before Open Season. Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest animals if they are to form a rag-tag army against the hunters.
